title: Plain Cake
description: This is just a boring plain cake
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
Pour the mixture into a baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Tonkatsu
description: Because who doesn't love fried food.
ingredients: Some salt and pepper for seasoning
tools: 1 bowl each for panko, flour, and egg
instructions: Smash pork evenly until approx 0.5 cm thick (use ziplock bag or clingwrap for easier cleanup).
Season cutlets with salt and pepper.
Put cutlet into bowl of flour and coat evenly, then follow up with egg and panko.
Heat up oil in frying pan.
Fry cutlet until golden brown on both sides (approx 2-3 minutes per side).
Lay out on paper towls to dry and cool down.
Eat with rice, cabbage, curry, or whatever your heart desires.

title: Onigiri
description: Rice and Filling, what more could anyone ever need?
instructions: Cook rice as you normally would
Dump ~1 large spoon of rice into bowl.
Create small divet in rice to place 2 tsp of fillings into.
Use plastic wrap to fold rice over fillings and squeeze to form triangular shape.
